Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player_board

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw_old.model.player_board.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
Class that models the player board. It instantiate a faith path, storages and slots for cards. It take count of the player statistics such as victory points.

    • getBasicProduction

      public ProductionEffect getBasicProduction()
      Returns:

    • isThereAnyLeaderCard

      public boolean isThereAnyLeaderCard()
      Test if there is any leader card.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least a leader card in the deck, false if not.
